articles.title: About me
articles.contents: I am a Master’s Student in the Bren School of Environmental Science and Management at UC Santa Barbara, studying the economics and politics of the environment with a focus in strategic communications. I aspire to support social justice movements through community-based research and policy advocacy.

          Hi!
          I am a Master’s Student in the Bren School of Environmental Science and Management at UC Santa Barbara, studying the economics and politics of the environment with a focus in strategic communications. I aspire to support social justice movements through community-based research and policy advocacy.
          
          
          Education
          The Bren School of Environmental Science & Management | Santa Barbara, CA  Master’s of Environmental Science & Management | 2021 - Expected 2023
          University of California, Davis | Davis, CA  B.S. Environmental Toxicology, minor Geographic Information Systems | 2016 - 2020
